issue.title: Splitwise App
issue.body:
## Build expense-sharing app

**Features:**
- Google OAuth login
- Create groups, add expenses
- Split equally, view balances

**Tech:** Next.js 14, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, SQLite, NextAuth.js

**Pages:** Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail

ems.task: Create project foundation with Next.js 14 setup, including package.json with all dependencies (NextAuth, Google OAuth provider, better-sqlite3, shadcn/ui, Tailwind), tsconfig.json with strict mode, .gitignore for Next.js, and initialize basic project structure (app/ directory, components/, lib/, prisma/ for SQLite schema).
ems.error: No workers merged - all had conflicts

ems.task: Implement authentication system and database layer. Create NextAuth.js configuration with Google OAuth provider, design and implement SQLite database schema for users, groups, expenses, and balances using Prisma ORM. Build all database models, migrations, and seed data. Owns: lib/auth.ts, lib/prisma.ts, prisma/schema.prisma, app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts.

workers.task: Setup Prisma ORM with SQLite and implement complete database schema with migrations. Create database client configuration and all seed data. Files: lib/prisma.ts (Prisma client singleton), prisma/schema.prisma (complete schema with User, Group, Expense, Balance models), prisma/migrations (create migrations), prisma/seed.ts (seed data for testing)

Implement NextAuth.js configuration with Google OAuth provider. Create authentication route handler and session management. Files: app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts (NextAuth API route), lib/auth.ts (auth configuration with Google provider, callbacks, session strategy), .env.local.example (environment variables template)

Create database utilities and helper functions for expense calculations. Files: lib/db/users.ts (user CRUD operations), lib/db/groups.ts (group CRUD operations), lib/db/expenses.ts (expense CRUD operations), lib/db/balances.ts (balance calculations and queries), lib/db/index.ts (barrel export of all DB functions)

ems.task: Build core application logic and API routes. Implement group creation/management, expense creation with equal splitting logic, balance calculation algorithms, and all CRUD operations. Create RESTful API endpoints for groups and expenses. Owns: app/api/groups/, app/api/expenses/, lib/calculations.ts, lib/actions.ts for server actions.

workers.task: Create group management API routes and database operations. Implement CRUD endpoints for groups including create, read, update, delete operations. Handle member management within groups.

Create expense management API routes and database operations. Implement CRUD endpoints for expenses with equal-split logic. Handle expense creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion with automatic balance calculations.
Implement balance calculation algorithms and core business logic utilities. Create equal-split calculation functions, balance tracking between users, and server actions for client-side integration.

ems.task: Create all UI components and pages. Build landing page, login/logout flow, dashboard with group overview, group detail pages with expense lists and balance views. Integrate shadcn/ui components (Button, Card, Input, Dialog, etc.) with Tailwind styling. Owns: app/page.tsx, app/login/page.tsx, app/dashboard/page.tsx, app/group/[id]/page.tsx, components/ui/, components/expense-form.tsx, components/balance-card.tsx.

workers.task: Create base UI components with shadcn/ui setup. Build Button, Input, Card, Dialog components with Tailwind styling. Create base layout components.
Build authentication and landing pages. Create login page with Google OAuth button, logout flow, and landing page with hero section and feature showcase.
Create dashboard and group pages with expense and balance components. Build dashboard with group overview, group detail page with expense list, expense form dialog, and balance cards.

analysisSummary: Build a complete expense-sharing application with Google OAuth authentication, group management, expense tracking, and balance calculations. Tech stack: Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components, SQLite database, and NextAuth.js.
